::FZ::

FZ watches the info being downloaded into the Iron Fist's main 
computer, his eyes reading the lines as they scroll down the screen. 
He tapped a few buttons, the drones of the Iron Fist instantly 
beginning to adapt a CR for this project of Magmatron's.

"Farewell, Commander Magmatron," he replies, but Magmatron was gone 
by then. FZ sits back. Magmatron had definately been a worthwhile 
ally.



--- In nbwrpg@y..., "dachande" <Dachande85@m...> wrote:
> ::Magmatron::
> 
>     Magmatron finished the device he had been working on since he 
had gotten to the beast wars. It was a transdimensional gateway. The 
only signatures that could go through were Destron signatures.
>     Magmatron took direct control over the Queen, his ultimate 
creation. She called her minions back to the Sulaco. Then she walked 
through the gateway, dissappearing into the dimension of Magmatron's 
choice.
>     He hit a few more buttons and set the Sulaco to destroy any 
opening in the mountain. This was nobody would get in to find his 
research, and since only a few people would know of the Sulaco he 
wouldn't worry. He then sent a comm to Zardus.
>     "Alliance Commander Zardus," He started. "I am dropping out of 
this war. I am sending a download of all my finding on this planet, 
and how to use them to your advantage, I wish you luck, and when I 
return I hope to find that you have the utmost advantage. Good-Bye."
>     The transmission ended with the sending of the downloaded 
information. It contained all the information regarding the Xenomorph 
DNA, how to graft it onto an existing warrior. And it was sent triple 
encoded, tight beam sucrity line, directly to the Iron Fist's command 
room.
>     The Destrons were all now returning to the Sulaco. Dachande had 
stayed behind, he still had business to take care of. Now that they 
were all onboard they all walked through the gateway. Jynx, 
Praetorian, Cerberus, Obitus, Fame, Bellum, AEger. They all went to 
the new dimension.
>     "Destrons, if you want to stay on earth, well, then you need to 
leave the Sulaco within the next 20 minutes, or else you will be 
stuck," Magmatron broadcast to all Destron units, in the feild or at 
base. 
>     Then he turned and faced the Gateway. He started to step 
through, then remembered something. He grabbed his data tracks that 
had everything they knew about Prime and the Autobots. Then he 
stepped through. The Gateway shut down behind him, only able to be 
activated by his hand. He saw his new home, it was a great place, 
huge, with many new worlds to conqure. He would be happy here.
